Description:
BRAND NEW THREE BEDROOM STUNNER
Boasting wonderful indoor and outdoor areas and a mix of formal and informal living zones, this brand new never-before-lived-in three bedroom family home with study boasts stunning fixtures and fittings, exquisite cabinet work, modern lighting, superb timber floors and stylish treatments at every turn.
Showcasing the interplay between form and function, strong clean lines
define the exterior, while inside, beautiful wooden floors strike a warm contract against paler walls.
All bedrooms boast BIRs, the spacious master suite with a magnificent walk-in robe leading to a chic ensuite.
Central to the functional floorplan is a sprawling open plan kitchen, dining and living area showcasing a wonderful sense of occasion and providing the optimal setting for relaxation and lavish entertaining, while magnificent floor-to-ceiling glass windows spiral in a symphony of natural light.
Bright and airy gourmet chef's kitchen includes double SS sink, high end oven and gas stove with range hood, and elegant breakfast bench.
Take the entertainment outside to the grassy rear yard with shed and an ideal northerly orientation perfect for hosting every imaginable soiree with lots of space for active kids and pets to run around and play.
Single lock up garage, clever front-facing study with tall windows, air conditioning, and a central family bathroom with separate bath and shower tick all the right boxes for a slice of high-end, low maintenance lifestyle living in the heart of happening Clayton South.
A short walk to Keeley Park, and a stone's throw away from Clayton Shopping Plaza, Rosebank Avenue Shops, Westall train station, Springvale Shopping Centre, Monash Medical Centre, short drive to Chadstone Shopping Centre, and easy freeway access to the CBD.
